aggregateFrom(Iterable<T>, Aggregator<A>) - Static method in class ch.lambdaj.Lambda
Returns a lambda function defined as:

aggregateFrom : (aggregator, iterable) => lambda : (convert : object => object) => object

It is then possibly to curry this function by selecting the convert function that defines how each item must be converted in the object to be aggregated.

DelayedClosure<T> - Class in ch.lambdaj.function.closure
Extends this class in order to define a closure that can be used with a nicer and more readable syntax as it follows: withTransaction(); { of(this).doSomething(); } To achieve this result the withTransaction() should be defined as: public void withTransaction() { delayedClosure(new DelayedClosure<Void>() { public Void doWithClosure(Closure closure) { beginTransaction(); closure.apply(); commit(); return null; } }); } It is also possible to get a result from the method that uses this kind of closure by reading it from the getClosureResult() method
DelayedClosure() - Constructor for class ch.lambdaj.function.closure.DelayedClosure
Creates a DelayedClosure

sumFrom(Iterable<T>) - Static method in class ch.lambdaj.Lambda
Returns a lambda function defined as:

sumFrom : (+, iterable) => lambda : (convert : object => number) => number

It is then possibly to curry this function by selecting the convert function that defines of each item must be converted in a number.

sumFrom(Iterable<T>, Class<?>) - Static method in class ch.lambdaj.Lambda
Returns a lambda function defined as:

sumFrom : (+, iterable) => lambda : (convert : object => number) => number

It is then possibly to curry this function by selecting the convert function that defines of each item must be converted in a number.
